sentences.sentence: Their age can be determined by extrapolation from their growth rate.
sentences.translation: 它们的年龄可从其生长速度来推定。

sentences.sentence: His estimate of half a million HIV-positive cases was based on an extrapolation of the known incidence of the virus.
sentences.translation: 他的50万HIV阳性病例的估计是基于对已知病毒发病率的推断。

sentences.sentence: It is an extrapolation with consequences.
sentences.translation: 这是一个有后续影响力的外推。
